biography_text: KINZINGER, Adam, a Representative from Illinois; born in Kankakee, Kankakee County, Ill., February 27, 1978; graduated from Normal West High School, Normal, Ill., 1996; B.A., Illinois State University, Normal, Ill., 2000; sales representative; United States Air Force and Illinois Air National Guard, 2003-present; member of the McLean County, Ill., board, 1998-2003; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Twelfth and to the three succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2011-present).
